DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study learn esreboxetine handle body i.e . absorption , metabolism excretion esreboxetine .
DOC.brief_title: Phase I Study Determine Absorption , Distribution , Metabolism Excretion Esreboxetine
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 45 65 year Body mass index ( BMI=weight/height2 ) 18 30 kg/m2 Any clinically relevant abnormality identify screen medical assessment Any condition possibly affect drug absorption Subjects exposure significant radiation ( eg serial Xray CT scan , barium meal etc ) participate radiolabelled study past 12 month , occupational exposure radioactivity History regular alcohol consumption exceed 14 drinks/week ( 1 drink = 5ounces ( 150ml ) wine 12 ounce ( 360ml ) beer 1.5 ounce ( 45ml ) hard liquor ) within 6 month screen 12lead ECG demonstrate QTc > 450mses screen Treatment investigational drug within 30 day 5 halflives precede first dose study medication
